scripts.git-client: cd tunazi && git add . && git commit -m Changes && git push origin client && cd ..
scripts.git-server: cd server && git add . && git commit -m Changes && git push origin server && cd ..
scripts.git: npm run git-client && npm run git-server
scripts.git-client-pull: cd tunazi && git add . && git commit -m Changes && git pull origin client && cd ..
scripts.git-server-pull: cd server && git add . && git commit -m Changes && git pull origin server && cd ..
scripts.git-pull: npm run git-client-pull && npm run git-server-pull
